mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BO_CONTRACT_IN C WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.IS_DELETED = 0 AND C.CONTRACT_CD = #{CONTRACT_CD}

SELECT t.CONTRACT_ID , t.CONTRACT_CD , t.PARTNER_ID , t.PARTNER_NAME , t.ATTACHMENT_ID , t.COST_P_1000 , t.create_date AS CREATE_DATE , t.update_date AS UPDATE_DATE , t.create_userid AS CREATE_USERID , t.update_userid AS UPDATE_USERID , f.PATH , f.FILE_NAME FROM BO_CONTRACT_IN t LEFT JOIN BO_FILE f ON f.FILE_ID = t.ATTACHMENT_ID WHERE t.IS_DELETED = 0 AND t.CONTRACT_CD = #{CONTRACT_CD}

SELECT CONTRACT_ID , CONTRACT_CD , PARTNER_ID , PARTNER_NAME , ATTACHMENT_ID , COST_P_1000 , create_date AS CREATE_DATE , update_date AS UPDATE_DATE , create_userid AS CREATE_USERID , update_userid AS UPDATE_USERID FROM BO_CONTRACT_IN c
AND c.CONTRACT_CD = #{CONTRACT_CD}
AND c.PARTNER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{PARTNER_NAME},'%')
AND C.IS_DELETED = 0
ORDER BY c.create_date desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BO_CONTRACT_IN c
AND c.CONTRACT_CD = #{CONTRACT_CD}
AND c.PARTNER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{PARTNER_NAME},'%')
AND C.IS_DELETED = 0
